mapper.select: select * from sys_codevaluemst order by table_mng_no, table_field_no, table_code_id

select a.sys_id,a.table_code_id, a.code_value,a.table_mng_no,a.table_field_no,d.table_field_name,d.table_name from sys_codevaluemst a left join (select b.*,c.table_field_no,table_field_name from sys_codetablemst b left join sys_codefieldsmst c on b.table_mng_no = c.table_mng_no ) d on a.table_field_no = d.table_field_no and a.table_mng_no = d.table_mng_no where a.table_mng_no = #{tableMngNo} and a.table_field_no = #{tableFieldNo}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_codevaluemst ( sys_id, table_code_id, table_mng_no, table_field_no, code_value ) values ( #{sysId}, #{tableCodeId}, #{tableMngNo}, #{tableFieldNo}, #{codeValue} )
